name: RadioListTile
desc: A [ListTile] with a [Radio]. In other words, a radio button with a label.

fields.name: value
fields.desc: The value represented by this radio button.

fields.name: groupValue
fields.desc: The currently selected value for this group of radio buttons.

fields.name: onChanged
fields.desc: Called when the user selects this radio button.

fields.name: mouseCursor
fields.desc: The cursor for a mouse pointer when it enters or is hovering over the widget.

fields.name: toggleable
fields.desc: Set to true if this radio list tile is allowed to be returned to an indeterminate state by selecting it again when selected.

fields.name: activeColor
fields.desc: The color to use when this radio button is selected.

fields.name: fillColor
fields.desc: The color that fills the radio button.

fields.name: materialTapTargetSize
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.radio.materialTapTargetSize}

fields.name: hoverColor
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.radio.hoverColor}

fields.name: overlayColor
fields.desc: The color for the radio's [Material].

fields.name: splashRadius
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.radio.splashRadius}

fields.name: title
fields.desc: The primary content of the list tile.

fields.name: subtitle
fields.desc: Additional content displayed below the title.

fields.name: secondary
fields.desc: A widget to display on the opposite side of the tile from the radio button.

fields.name: isThreeLine
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is intended to display three lines of text.

fields.name: dense
fields.desc: Whether this list tile is part of a vertically dense list.

fields.name: selected
fields.desc: Whether to render icons and text in the [activeColor].

fields.name: controlAffinity
fields.desc: Where to place the control relative to the text.

fields.name: autofocus
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.autofocus}

fields.name: contentPadding
fields.desc: Defines the insets surrounding the contents of the tile.

fields.name: shape
fields.desc: If specified, [shape] defines the shape of the [RadioListTile]'s [InkWell] border.

fields.name: tileColor
fields.desc: If specified, defines the background color for `RadioListTile` when [RadioListTile.selected] is false.

fields.name: selectedTileColor
fields.desc: If non-null, defines the background color when [RadioListTile.selected] is true.

fields.name: visualDensity
fields.desc: Defines how compact the list tile's layout will be.

fields.name: focusNode
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.widgets.Focus.focusNode}

fields.name: onFocusChange
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.inkwell.onFocusChange}

fields.name: enableFeedback
fields.desc: {@macro flutter.material.ListTile.enableFeedback}

fields.name: internalAddSemanticForOnTap
fields.desc: Whether to add button:true to the semantics if onTap is provided. This is a temporary flag to help changing the behavior of ListTile onTap semantics.

fields.name: useCupertinoCheckmarkStyle
fields.desc: Whether to use the checkbox style for the [CupertinoRadio] control.

fields.name: radioScaleFactor
fields.desc: Controls the scaling factor applied to the [Radio] within the [RadioListTile].
